channel.title: Great Film Collections and Lists
channel.description: Updates on changes and additions to police beat central.

item.title: The Great Art House Movies
item.description: Art House films are primarily concerned about aesthetic reasons rather than commercial profit. Typically, Unconventional narrative and elements are widely seen due to targeting a niche audience rather than the mass audience.
item.dc:creator: Can Burak S.

item.title: The Best Based on True Story Movies
item.description: In this list, which does not shift to alternative history scenarios when describing historicality, you will find many historically important and/or inspirational figures and also events such as victories, wars, and genocides.
item.dc:creator: Can Burak S.

item.title: Pixly- The Great Movies That Passed The Bechdel Test
item.description: Although it is not a perfect test or perfect indicator, it is a test that used as an indicator for the active presence of women in the fiction and to call attention to gender inequality.
item.dc:creator: Can Burak S.

item.title: The Most Controversial Movies of All Times
item.description: The Best controversial movies of all times list. The movies provoke the audiences and cause public disagreements on specific issue.
item.dc:creator: Can Burak S.

item.title: The Best Cyberpunk Movies Of All Times
item.description: Cyberpunk is classified as a subgenre of science-fiction and tends to focus on a combination of "high-tech low-life. Cyberpunk deals with the radical changes in the social order while humanity achieving technological and scientific developments.
item.dc:creator: Can Burak S.

item.title: December 2019: The Best Movies in Theaters in December 2019
item.description: We have compiled some of the best movies that will be in the theatres in december 2019. You will see the latest Jumanji film, the end movie of the Star Wars Saga The Rise of the Skywalker, long awaited Portrait of a Lady on Fire, Adam Sandler's most transformative role in his carrier in Uncut Gems and many more.
item.dc:creator: Can Burak S.

item.title: The Best Dialogue Movies That Focus on Rich and Intelligent Dialogues
item.description: Cinema is also a verbal tool as well as a visual one. Some films come to the fore with their rich dialogues without compromising their visual and audio values.There are even some that a whole film is almost exclusively among people in a room. Sometimes the dialogue itself can be very striking.
item.dc:creator: Can Burak S.

item.title: The Best Feeling Good Movies That Leaves Warm Feelings On You
item.description: Some films remind us what is valuable, what we have is more valuable than what we don't have. Here, the movies leaves warm feelings and good vibes on you.
item.dc:creator: Can Burak S.

item.title: The Best LGBTQ+ Movies of All Times
item.description: We have entered a time which there is plenty of LGBT movies are releasing in mainstream. Starting from the 2010's, queer cinema's influence evolved towards a more universal audience. Here the list of best LGBT+ movies of all times.
item.dc:creator: Can Burak S.

item.title: The Best Thought Provoking and Mind Bending Movies
item.description: As the world's most complex art form, cinema offers us new ideas, new ways of thinking about something. Although it is very important to gaining a new ideas, the more important thing is to rethink what we assume is we already know.
item.dc:creator: Can Burak S.
